FuncDef:
The remote-attestation acl command binds an ACL to remote attestation.
The undo remote-attestation acl command deletes the binding between an ACL and remote attestation.
By default, no ACL is bound to remote attestation.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an ACL4 number.
The value is an integer ranging from 2000 to 3999.

Specifies an ACL4 name.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After remote attestation is configured, a remote attestation server attempts to connect to a local device. You can run the remote-attestation acl command to bind an ACL rule to remote attestation for the local device to prevent invalid connections and improve device security.
Prerequisites
An ACL has been created using the acl command.
